content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you will find my apartment in München to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. How much are you willing to pay for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am interested in your apartment and I believe it has great potential. However, I am a student and I must consider my budget carefully. I am looking for a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment while also taking into account my financial situation. Would you be willing to negotiate a lower price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, I understand that every tenant has their own financial situation. However, my apartment is brand new and in a prime location, which justifies a higher price. Nevertheless, I am willing to consider a small discount for a long-term tenant like yourself. How many years are you planning to rent the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am looking to rent the apartment for at least two years, with the possibility of extending the lease if both parties are satisfied. Would it be possible to discuss a price that reflects the long-term commitment I am offering?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Two years is an acceptable term for me, Yi-Nuo. Considering the location and quality of the apartment, I would normally charge 1,200 Euro per month. However, since you are a student and are willing to commit to a long-term lease, I am prepared to offer you a 10% discount for the first year. This would bring the monthly rent down to 1,080 Euro. For the second year, I would expect to return to the full price of 1,200 Euro. Would this be a fair arrangement for you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your generosity with the 10% discount for the first year. The monthly rent of 1,080 Euro is more aligned with my budget, and the long-term commitment from both parties gives me confidence in the stability of the arrangement. I would like to proceed with the rental at this price for the first year. Would you be willing to formalize this agreement?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that we have reached an agreement, Yi-Nuo. To formalize the arrangement, I will prepare a lease agreement that outlines the terms of the rental, including the monthly rent of 1,080 Euro for the first year and the expectation of 1,200 Euro per month for the second year. Once you sign the lease, we can proceed with the rental process. Is there anything else we need to discuss before moving forward?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I would like to ensure that the lease agreement includes a provision for any necessary repairs or maintenance during my tenancy. Additionally, I would appreciate if we could agree on a schedule for regular inspections to ensure that the apartment remains in good condition. Lastly, I would like to confirm that the utilities, such as water and electricity, are not included in the rent and will be my responsibility. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Of course, Yi-Nuo. The lease agreement will include details about maintenance and repair responsibilities. Regular inspections are also standard practice, and we can agree on a schedule that is convenient for both parties. Regarding utilities, you are correct; they are not included in the rent and will be your responsibility. The lease will specify that you are responsible for paying all utilities directly to the respective service providers. Is there anything else you would like to clarify before we proceed with the lease?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, Mister Schmidt, I believe we have covered all the important points. I am ready to sign the lease agreement once it is prepared. Thank you for your time and for reaching a fair agreement. I look forward to a smooth and successful tenancy at your apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Excellent, Yi-Nuo. I'm pleased to have reached a satisfactory agreement with you. I will prepare the lease agreement and send it to you for review and signature. Once you have signed it and returned it to me, we can proceed with the rental process. I look forward to a long and fruitful relationship as landlord and tenant. Thank you for choosing my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: You're welcome, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your professionalism and the quality of your apartment. I am excited to make it my home for the next two years. Once I receive the lease agreement, I will review it carefully and sign it promptly. Thank you again for your time and effort in making this arrangement. I am looking forward to a positive tenancy. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
